statements.update: INSERT INTO PUB_表单数据文件(ID,表单ID,护理单元ID,病人ID,修改用户,修改时间,归档人,归档时间,版本号,页号,内容) VALUES (#ID#,#FormID#,#DepartmentID#,#PatientID#,#ModifyUser#,#ModifyTime#,#Archive#,#ArchiveDate#,#VersionCode#,#Pages#,#Content#)

update PUB_表单数据文件 set
表单ID=#FormID# 护理单元ID=#DepartmentID# 病人ID=#PatientID# 修改用户=#ModifyUser# 修改时间=#ModifyTime# 归档人=#Archive# 归档时间=#ArchiveDate# 版本号=#VersionCode# 页号=#Pages# 内容=#Content#
where ID=#ID#
statements.delete: delete from PUB_表单数据文件 where ID=#ID#
statements.select: select id,名称 as Mc,快捷码 as Kjm,类型 as Lx,子码 as Zm,修改用户 as Cjr,to_char(修改时间, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS Cjsj from PUB_表单 WHERE 表单对照 = #FormID#
SELECT * FROM PUB_表单数据文件 WHERE ID=#ID#

Select a.Id, b.id AS "FormID",c.报表关联ID AS "ReportFormID",b.名称 As "Name", a.修改用户 As "CreateUser", d.名称 As "CreateDepartment", To_Char(a.修改时间, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') As "CreateDate", Substr(To_Char(c.发布时间, 'yyyyMMdd'), 3) As "Version", (SELECT to_char(wm_concat(ID)) FROM HNS_病人护理评分 WHERE 表单记录ID=a.ID) AS "ScoreRecord" From PUB_表单数据文件 A, PUB_表单 B, PUB_表单版本文件 C, 系统_组织机构 D Where a.表单id = b.Id And b.Id = c.表单id And a.版本号 = c.版本号 And a.护理单元id = d.Id And a.护理单元id = #DepartmentID# And a.病人id = #PatientID# AND b.类型=#Type# Order By a.修改时间 DESC

Select a.Id, b.id AS "FormID", b.名称 As "Name", a.修改用户 As "CreateUser", d.名称 As "CreateDepartment", To_Char(a.修改时间, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') As "CreateDate", Substr(To_Char(c.发布时间, 'yyyyMMdd'), 3) As "Version", (SELECT to_char(wm_concat(ID)) FROM HNS_病人护理评分 WHERE 表单记录ID=a.ID) AS "ScoreRecord" From PUB_表单数据文件 A, PUB_表单 B, PUB_表单版本文件 C, 系统_组织机构 D Where a.表单id = b.Id And b.Id = c.表单id And a.版本号 = c.版本号 And a.护理单元id = d.Id And a.护理单元id = #DepartmentID# And a.病人id = #PatientID#
b.类型=#Type#
Order By a.修改时间 DESC
SELECT * FROM PUB_表单版本文件 WHERE 表单ID=#ID#
Select max(版本号) From PUB_表单版本文件 Where 表单ID = #FormID# And 发布时间 Is Not Null

Select #ID# AS "ID", a.Id AS "FormID", a.名称 AS "Name", a.修改用户 AS "ModifyUser", To_Char(a.修改时间, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "ModifyDate", 适用科室 AS "DeptRange", b.名称 "CreateDept", Substr(To_Char(c.发布时间, 'yyyyMMdd'), 3) As "Version" From PUB_表单 A, PUB_表单版本文件 C, 系统_组织机构 B Where a.Id = c.表单id And a.Id = #FormID# And a.最新版本号 = c.版本号 And b.Id = #DepartmentID#
Select a.版本号 AS "Version", b.Id AS "FormID", b.名称 AS "Name" From PUB_表单数据文件 A, PUB_表单 B Where a.表单id = b.Id And a.Id = #FormID#
Select '' 版本号 AS "Version", b.Id AS "FormID", b.名称 AS "Name" From PUB_表单 B Where b.Id = #FormID#;
Select c.表单格式 AS "FormFormat",c.网页 AS "PageContent" From PUB_表单 B, PUB_表单版本文件 C Where b.Id = #ID# And b.Id = c.表单id And b.最新版本号 = c.版本号 And c.页号 = #Pages# And c.发布时间 Is Not Null
Select c.表单格式A AS "FormFormat",c.网页A AS "PageContent" From PUB_表单 B, PUB_表单版本文件 C Where b.Id = #ID# And b.Id = c.表单id And b.最新版本号 = c.版本号 And c.页号 = #Pages# And c.发布时间 Is Not Null
Select c.表单格式B AS "FormFormat",c.网页B AS "PageContent" From PUB_表单 B, PUB_表单版本文件 C Where b.Id = #ID# And b.Id = c.表单id And b.最新版本号 = c.版本号 And c.页号 = #Pages# And c.发布时间 Is Not Null
Select c.表单格式C AS "FormFormat",c.网页C AS "PageContent" From PUB_表单 B, PUB_表单版本文件 C Where b.Id = #ID# And b.Id = c.表单id And b.最新版本号 = c.版本号 And c.页号 = #Pages# And c.发布时间 Is Not Null
Select 内容 AS "Content",页号 As "PageNo" From PUB_表单数据文件 Where ID = #ID#

Select A.ID AS "PatientID",B.ExtraInfo From pub_病人基本信息 A Join ( Select 对象相关ID,LISTAGG(信息名||':'||信息值,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY 对象相关ID) ExtraInfo From pub_病人补充信息 WHERE 信息值 IS NOT NULL Group by 对象相关ID ) B on B.对象相关ID=A.ID WHERE A.ID = #PatientID#

select * from HNS_病人护理表单
ID=#ID# 表单ID like '%$FormID$%' 护理单元ID like '%$DepartmentID$%' 病人ID like '%$PatientID$%' 修改用户 like '%$ModifyUser$%' 修改时间 > to_date(#StartDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 < to_date(#EndDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 like '%$ModifyTime$%' 归档人 like '%$Archive$%' 归档时间 > to_date(#StartDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 归档时间 < to_date(#EndDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 归档时间 like '%$ArchiveDate$%' 版本号 like '%$VersionCode$%' 页号 like '%$Pages$%' 内容 like '%$Content$%'
$ORDER_BY_CLAUSE$

SELECT count(*) FROM HNS_病人护理表单
ID=#ID# 表单ID like '%$FormID$%' 护理单元ID like '%$DepartmentID$%' 病人ID like '%$PatientID$%' 修改用户 like '%$ModifyUser$%' 修改时间 > to_date(#StartDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 < to_date(#EndDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 like '%$ModifyTime$%' 归档人 like '%$Archive$%' 归档时间 > to_date(#StartDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 归档时间 < to_date(#EndDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 归档时间 like '%$ArchiveDate$%' 版本号 like '%$VersionCode$%' 页号 like '%$Pages$%' 内容 like '%$Content$%'
$ORDER_BY_CLAUSE$
